title: 89. Why You Need A Morning Routine + My Morning Routine
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are talking all about the morning routine. Are you the type of person that wakes up, rolls over to check your phone, and rushing to make it to work on time? If so, I think you will VERY much appreciate this episode. How we treat our mornings lays the foundation for what our days will look like. If you care about your energy and your daily interactions, you won't want to miss this one!

Click here to get free tips in on transforming your old limiting beliefs around money straight to your inbox. (or visit https://www.beatricekamau.com/moneymindsettips)

Abundance journal reference

Business Inquiries?

IG: @theselflovefix.
